name: Pumpkin Rush V.1.2
description:
This is a Halloween-themed game! It's really fun, plus it was like so easy to make for the main part of the game. Of course, some people helped me like @Bread_man2233 on scratch for the falling script, and on itch.io @XGGamer . Thanks to them, I was able to complete this project. 

------------Instructions----------

Space to skip intro ( only for PC) 

Move your mouse/ or finger to control the Player (The man at the bottom)

Press Restart two times, for confirmation, to restart the game anytime, even in the wasted GTA 5 screen!

No changing of the speed and no edge cheating, why, because there are pumpkins there too?
